english_translation: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
All praise is due to Allah, Lord of all the worlds.
The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
Master of the Day of Judgment.
You alone we worship, and You alone we ask for help.
Guide us to the straight path.

ayah_text: صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ
english_translation: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have earned anger nor of those who are astray.
Alif, Lam, Meem.
tajweed_notes: Each letter pronounced separately with madd 6 counts

ayah_text: ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ هُدًى لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
english_translation: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah.

ayah_text: الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنْفِقُونَ
english_translation: Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them.
transliteration: Alladheena yu'minoona bil-ghaybi wa yuqeemoonas-salata wa mimma razaqnahum yunfiqoon

ayah_text: وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنْزِلَ مِنْ قَبْلِكَ وَبِالْآخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
english_translation: And who believe in what has been revealed to you and what was revealed before you, and of the Hereafter they are certain.
transliteration: Walladheena yu'minoona bima unzila ilayka wa ma unzila min qablika wa bil-aakhirati hum yooqinoon

ayah_text: أُولَٰئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدًى مِنْ رَبِّهِمْ وَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ
english_translation: Those are upon guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful.

ayah_text: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ لَا تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلَا نَوْمٌ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلَّا بِمَا شَاءَ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ
english_translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is it that can intercede with Him except by His permission? He knows what is before them and what will be after them, and they encompass not a thing of His knowledge except for what He wills. His Kursi extends over the heavens and the earth, and their preservation tires Him not. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.
transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illa Huwal-Hayyul-Qayyoom, la ta'khudhuhoo sinatuw-wa la nawm...
theme: Ayat al-Kursi - Greatest verse of the Quran

ayah_text: آمَنَ الرَّسُولُ بِمَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ رَبِّهِ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ كُلٌّ آمَنَ بِاللَّهِ وَمَلَائِكَتِهِ وَكُتُبِهِ وَرُسُلِهِ لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَيْنَ أَحَدٍ مِنْ رُسُلِهِ وَقَالُوا سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا غُفْرَانَكَ رَبَّنَا وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ
english_translation: The Messenger has believed in what was revealed to him from his Lord, and so have the believers. All of them have believed in Allah and His angels and His books and His messengers, saying, 'We make no distinction between any of His messengers.' And they say, 'We hear and we obey. Grant us Your forgiveness, our Lord, and to You is the final destination.'
transliteration: Aamanar-Rasoolu bima unzila ilayhi mir-Rabbihi wal-mu'minoon...

ayah_text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتْ وَعَلَيْهَا مَا اكْتَسَبَتْ رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِنْ نَسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا رَبَّنَا وَلَا تَحْمِلْ عَلَيْنَا إِصْرًا كَمَا حَمَلْتَهُ عَلَى الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِنَا رَبَّنَا وَلَا تُحَمِّلْنَا مَا لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا بِهِ وَاعْفُ عَنَّا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَارْحَمْنَا أَنْتَ مَوْلَانَا فَانْصُرْنَا عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ
english_translation: Allah does not charge a soul except with that within its capacity. It will have what it has gained, and it will bear what it has earned. Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we have forgotten or erred. Our Lord, and lay not upon us a burden like that which You laid upon those before us. Our Lord, and burden us not with that which we have no ability to bear. And pardon us; and forgive us; and have mercy upon us. You are our protector, so give us victory over the disbelieving people.
theme: Allah's mercy - no soul burdened beyond capacity

ayah_text: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَنْزَلَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ الْكِتَابَ وَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ لَهُ عِوَجًا
english_translation: Praise is due to Allah, who has sent down upon His servant the Book and has not made therein any deviance.
transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-ladhi anzala 'ala 'abdihil-kitaba wa lam yaj'al lahu 'iwaja

ayah_text: قَيِّمًا لِيُنْذِرَ بَأْسًا شَدِيدًا مِنْ لَدُنْهُ وَيُبَشِّرَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ الَّذِينَ يَعْمَلُونَ الصَّالِحَاتِ أَنَّ لَهُمْ أَجْرًا حَسَنًا
english_translation: He has made it straight, to warn of severe punishment from Him and to give good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a good reward.
theme: The Quran warns and gives glad tidings

english_translation: In which they will remain forever.

ayah_text: وَيُنْذِرَ الَّذِينَ قَالُوا اتَّخَذَ اللَّهُ وَلَدًا
english_translation: And to warn those who say, 'Allah has taken a son.'
theme: Warning against attributing children to Allah

ayah_text: مَا لَهُمْ بِهِ مِنْ عِلْمٍ وَلَا لِآبَائِهِمْ كَبُرَتْ كَلِمَةً تَخْرُجُ مِنْ أَفْوَاهِهِمْ إِنْ يَقُولُونَ إِلَّا كَذِبًا
english_translation: They have no knowledge of it, nor had their fathers. Grave is the word that comes out of their mouths; they speak not except a lie.
transliteration: Ma lahum bihi min 'ilmiw-wa la li-aabaa'ihim, kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwaahihim...
theme: Falsehood of ascribing children to Allah

ayah_text: فَلَعَلَّكَ بَاخِعٌ نَفْسَكَ عَلَىٰ آثَارِهِمْ إِنْ لَمْ يُؤْمِنُوا بِهَٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ أَسَفًا
english_translation: Then perhaps you would kill yourself through grief over them, if they do not believe in this message, and out of sorrow.
transliteration: Fala'allaka baakhi'un nafsaka 'ala aathaarihim il-lam yu'minoo bihadhal-hadeethi asafa

ayah_text: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا مَا عَلَى الْأَرْضِ زِينَةً لَهَا لِنَبْلُوَهُمْ أَيُّهُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا
english_translation: Indeed, We have made that which is on the earth adornment for it that We may test them as to which of them is best in deed.
transliteration: Inna ja'alna ma 'alal-ardi zeenatal-laha linabluwahum ayyuhum ahsanu 'amala

ayah_text: وَإِنَّا لَجَاعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيْهَا صَعِيدًا جُرُزًا
english_translation: And indeed, We will make what is upon it into a barren ground.
transliteration: Wa inna laja'iloona ma 'alayha sa'eedan juruza

ayah_text: أَمْ حَسِبْتَ أَنَّ أَصْحَابَ الْكَهْفِ وَالرَّقِيمِ كَانُوا مِنْ آيَاتِنَا عَجَبًا
english_translation: Or have you thought that the companions of the cave and the inscription were, among Our signs, a wonder?
transliteration: Am hasibta anna as-habal-kahfi war-raqeemi kaanoo min aayaatina 'ajaba
theme: Introduction to the story of the Cave

ayah_text: إِذْ أَوَى الْفِتْيَةُ إِلَى الْكَهْفِ فَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا آتِنَا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً وَهَيِّئْ لَنَا مِنْ أَمْرِنَا رَشَدًا
english_translation: When the youths retreated to the cave and said, 'Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy and prepare for us from our affair right guidance.'
transliteration: Idh awal-fityatu ilal-kahfi faqaaloo Rabbana aatina mil-ladunka rahmataw-wa hayyi' lana min amrina rashada
theme: The youths seek refuge in the cave

english_translation: Ya, Seen.
By the wise Quran.
Indeed you are among the messengers.
On a straight path.
A revelation of the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

ayah_text: لِتُنْذِرَ قَوْمًا مَا أُنْذِرَ آبَاؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَافِلُونَ
english_translation: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware.
transliteration: Litundhira qawmam-ma undhira aabaaa'uhum fahum ghaafiloon

ayah_text: لَقَدْ حَقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
english_translation: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe.
transliteration: Laqad haqqal-qawlu 'ala aktharihim fahum la yu'minoon

ayah_text: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِي أَعْنَاقِهِمْ أَغْلَالًا فَهِيَ إِلَى الْأَذْقَانِ فَهُمْ مُقْمَحُونَ
english_translation: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads aloft.
transliteration: Inna ja'alna fee a'naaqihim aghlaalan fahiya ilal-adhqaani fahum muqmahoon

ayah_text: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنْ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَاهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
english_translation: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see.
transliteration: Wa ja'alna mim-bayni aydeehim saddaw-wa min khalfihim saddan fa-aghshaynahum fahum la yubsiroon

ayah_text: وَسَوَاءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَأَنْذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنْذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
english_translation: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.
transliteration: Wa sawaa'un 'alayhim a-andhartahum am lam tundhirhum la yu'minoon

ayah_text: إِنَّمَا تُنْذِرُ مَنِ اتَّبَعَ الذِّكْرَ وَخَشِيَ الرَّحْمَٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
english_translation: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Gracious unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and a noble reward.
transliteration: Innama tundhiru manit-taba'adh-dhikra wa khashiyar-Rahmana bil-ghaybi fabashshirhu bimaghfiratw-wa ajrin kareem
theme: Those who benefit from the warning

ayah_text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي الْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا وَآثَارَهُمْ وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ فِي إِمَامٍ مُبِينٍ
english_translation: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and what they left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register.
transliteration: Inna nahnu nuhyil-mawtaa wa naktubu ma qaddamoo wa aathaarahum wa kulla shay'in ahsaynaahu fee imaamim-mubeen

english_translation: The Most Merciful
Taught the Quran
Created man
Taught him eloquence
The sun and the moon move by precise calculation
And the stars and trees prostrate
And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance
That you not transgress within the balance

ayah_text: وَأَقِيمُوا الْوَزْنَ بِالْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا الْمِيزَانَ
english_translation: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance
transliteration: Wa aqeemul-wazna bil-qisti wa la tukhsirul-meezaan

english_translation: And the earth He laid out for the creatures
Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths of dates
And grain having husks and scented plants
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
theme: Refrain - which blessings do you deny?

ayah_text: تَبَارَكَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ الْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
english_translation: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent.
transliteration: Tabarakal-ladhi biyadihil-mulku wa Huwa 'ala kulli shay'in Qadeer

ayah_text: الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْمَوْتَ وَالْحَيَاةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفُورُ
english_translation: He who created death and life to test you as to which of you is best in deed - and He is the Exalted in Might, the Forgiving.
transliteration: Alladhi khalaqal-mawta wal-hayata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu 'amala...

ayah_text: الَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا مَا تَرَىٰ فِي خَلْقِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ مِنْ تَفَاوُتٍ فَارْجِعِ الْبَصَرَ هَلْ تَرَىٰ مِنْ فُطُورٍ
english_translation: He who created seven heavens in layers. You do not see in the creation of the Most Merciful any inconsistency. So return your vision; do you see any breaks?

ayah_text: ثُمَّ ارْجِعِ الْبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيْنِ يَنْقَلِبْ إِلَيْكَ الْبَصَرُ خَاسِئًا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٌ
english_translation: Then return your vision twice again. Your vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued.
transliteration: Thummar-ji'il-basara karratayn, yanqalib ilaykal-basaru khaasi'aw-wa huwa haseer

ayah_text: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا السَّمَاءَ الدُّنْيَا بِمَصَابِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَاهَا رُجُومًا لِلشَّيَاطِينِ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ السَّعِيرِ
english_translation: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made them as missiles to drive away the devils, and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze.
transliteration: Wa laqad zayyannnas-samaa'ad-dunya bimasaabeeha wa ja'alnaaha rujoomal-lish-shayaateen...

english_translation: By the morning brightness
And by the night when it covers with darkness
Your Lord has not taken leave of you, nor has He detested you
transliteration: Ma wadda'aka Rabbuka wa ma qalaa
theme: Allah has not abandoned the Prophet

english_translation: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first life
And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied
Did He not find you an orphan and give you refuge?
And He found you lost and guided you
And He found you poor and made you self-sufficient
So as for the orphan, do not oppress him
And as for the petitioner, do not repel him
But as for the favor of your Lord, report it
Did We not expand for you your breast?
And We removed from you your burden
Which had weighed upon your back
And raised high for you your repute
For indeed, with hardship comes ease
Indeed, with hardship comes ease
So when you have finished your duties, then stand up for worship
And to your Lord direct your longing
Say, 'He is Allah, the One'
Allah, the Eternal Refuge
He neither begets nor is born
Nor is there to Him any equivalent
Say, 'I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak'
From the evil of that which He created
And from the evil of darkness when it settles
transliteration: Wa min sharri ghaasiqin idha waqab

english_translation: And from the evil of the blowers in knots
And from the evil of an envier when he envies
transliteration: Wa min sharri haasidin idha hasad

english_translation: Say, 'I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind'
The Sovereign of mankind
The God of mankind
From the evil of the retreating whisperer
Who whispers in the breasts of mankind
From among the jinn and mankind
theme: Evil from both jinn and humans

english_translation: Say, 'O disbelievers'
I do not worship what you worship
Nor are you worshippers of what I worship
Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship
Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship
For you is your religion, and for me is my religion
Indeed, We have granted you Al-Kawthar
So pray to your Lord and sacrifice
Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off
When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest

ayah_text: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
english_translation: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes
transliteration: Wa ra'aytan-naasa yadkhuloona fee deenillahi afwaaja

ayah_text: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
english_translation: Then exalt Him with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance
transliteration: Fasabbih bihamdi Rabbika wastaghfirh, innahu kaana tawwaaba

english_translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he

ayah_text: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
english_translation: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained
transliteration: Ma aghnaa 'anhu maaluhu wa ma kasab

english_translation: He will burn in a Fire of blazing flame
And his wife, the carrier of firewood
Around her neck is a rope of palm fiber
By time
Indeed, mankind is in loss

ayah_text: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
english_translation: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience
transliteration: Illal-ladheena aamanoo wa 'amilus-saalihaati wa tawasaw bil-haqqi wa tawasaw bis-sabr

ayah_text: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
english_translation: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?
transliteration: Alam tara kayfa fa'ala Rabbuka bi-as-haabil-feel

english_translation: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?
And He sent against them birds in flocks
Striking them with stones of baked clay
And He made them like eaten straw
For the accustomed security of the Quraysh
Their accustomed caravan journeys of winter and summer
Let them worship the Lord of this House

ayah_text: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُمْ مِنْ جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُمْ مِنْ خَوْفٍ
english_translation: Who has fed them against hunger and made them safe from fear
transliteration: Alladhi at'amahum min joo'iw-wa aamanahum min khawf

english_translation: Indeed, We sent it down during the Night of Decree
And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

ayah_text: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
english_translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months

ayah_text: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِمْ مِنْ كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
english_translation: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter
transliteration: Tanazzalul-malaa'ikatu war-Roohu feeha bi-idhni Rabbihim min kulli amr

english_translation: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn
Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?
For that is the one who drives away the orphan
And does not encourage the feeding of the poor
So woe to those who pray
Who are heedless of their prayer
Those who make show of their deeds
And withhold simple assistance

ayah_text: وَبَشِّرِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ أَنَّ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ كُلَّمَا رُزِقُوا۟ مِنْهَا مِن ثَمَرَةٍۢ رِّزْقًۭا ۙ قَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى رُزِقْنَا مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَأُتُوا۟ بِهِۦ مُتَشَـٰبِهًۭا ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِيهَآ أَزْوَٰجٌۭ مُّطَهَّرَةٌۭ ۖ وَهُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
english_translation: And give good tidings to those who believe and do righteous deeds that they will have gardens [in Paradise] beneath which rivers flow. Whenever they are provided with a provision of fruit therefrom, they will say, 'This is what we were provided with before.' And it is given to them in likeness. And they will have therein purified spouses, and they will abide therein eternally.
transliteration: Wa bashshiril-ladheena aamanoo wa 'amilus-saalihaati anna lahum jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaar; kullamaa ruziqoo minhaa min samaratin rizqan qaaloo haazalladhee ruziqnaa min qablu wa otoobihee mutashaabihaa; wa lahum feehaaa azwaajum-mutahharatunw-wa hum feehaa khaalidoon

ayah_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ كَانَتْ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتُ ٱلْفِرْدَوْسِ نُزُلًا
english_translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - they will have the Gardens of Paradise as a lodging.
transliteration: Innal-ladheena aamanoo wa 'amilus-saalihaati kaanat lahum jannaatul-firdawsi nuzulaa

english_translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs.

ayah_text: وَفِى ٱلْجَنَّةِ مَا تَشْتَهِيهِ ٱلْأَنفُسُ وَتَلَذُّ ٱلْأَعْيُنُ وَأَنتُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
english_translation: And therein is whatever the souls desire and [what] delights the eyes, and you will abide therein eternally.
transliteration: Wa fil-jannati ma tashtaheehi al-anfusu wa talazzul-a'yunu wa antum feehaa khaalidoon

ayah_text: وَمَنْ أَحْسَنُ قَوْلًا مِّمَّن دَعَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًۭا وَقَالَ إِنَّنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
english_translation: And who is better in speech than one who invites to Allah and does righteousness and says, 'Indeed, I am of the Muslims.'
transliteration: Wa man ahsanu qawlam mimman da'aa ilal-laahi wa 'amila saalihanw-wa qaala innanee minal-muslimeen

ayah_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ سَنُدْخِلُهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقًّۭا ۚ وَمَنْ أَصْدَقُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ قِيلًا
english_translation: But those who believe and do righteous deeds - We will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide forever. [It is] the promise of Allah, [which is] truth, and who is more truthful than Allah in statement.
transliteration: Wal-ladheena aamanoo wa 'amilus-saalihaati sanudkhiluhum jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaar khaalideena feehaa abada; wa'dal-laahi haqqan; wa man asdaqu minal-laahi qeelaa

ayah_text: وَسَارِعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَغْفِرَةٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرْضُهَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ أُعِدَّتْ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
english_translation: And hasten to forgiveness from your Lord and a garden as wide as the heavens and earth, prepared for the righteous.
transliteration: Wa saari'oo ilaa maghfiratim mir rabbikum wa jannatin 'arduhas-samaawaatu wal-ard; u'iddat lil-muttaqeen

ayah_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتُ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
english_translation: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them are the Gardens of Pleasure.
And in that let the competitors compete.
Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure.

ayah_text: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَمَسَـٰكِنَ طَيِّبَةًۭ فِى جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍۢ ۚ وَرِضْوَٰنٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
english_translation: Allah has promised the believing men and believing women gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally, and pleasant dwellings in gardens of perpetual residence; but approval from Allah is greater. It is that which is the great attainment.
transliteration: Wa'adal-laahul-mu'mineena wal-mu'minaati jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaar khaalideena feehaa wa masaakina tayyibatan fee jannaat 'adnin wa ridwaanum minal-laahi akbar; zaalika huwal-fawzul-'azeem

ayah_text: إِنَّ السَّاعَةَ آتِيَةٌ أَكَادُ أُخْفِيهَا لِتُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا تَسْعَىٰ
english_translation: Indeed, the Hour is coming - I almost conceal it - so that every soul may be recompensed according to that for which it strives.
transliteration: Inna as-sa'ata aatiyatun akadu ukhfeeha litujza kullu nafsin bima tas'aa

ayah_text: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ فَصَعِقَ مَنْ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَنْ فِي الْأَرْضِ إِلَّا مَنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ ۖ ثُمَّ نُفِخَ فِيهِ أُخْرَىٰ فَإِذَا هُمْ قِيَامٌ يَنظُرُونَ
english_translation: And the Horn will be blown, and whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth will fall dead except whom Allah wills. Then it will be blown again, and at once they will be standing, looking on.
transliteration: Wanufikha fee as-soori fa sa'iqa man fee as-samawati waman fee al-ardi illa man shaa Allah. Thumma nufikha feehi ukhra fa idha hum qiyamun yanzuroon

ayah_text: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
english_translation: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes
transliteration: Yawma yunfakhu fee as-soori fata'toona afwaja

english_translation: And when the stars fall, scattering,
It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,

ayah_text: وَتَرَى كُلَّ أُمَّةٍ جَاثِيَةً ۚ كُلُّ أُمَّةٍ تُدْعَىٰ إِلَىٰ كِتَابِهَا ۚ الْيَوْمَ تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
english_translation: And you will see every nation kneeling [from fear]. Every nation will be called to its record [and told], 'Today you will be recompensed for what you used to do.'
transliteration: Watarā kulla ummatin jāthiyatan kullu ummatin tud'ā ilā kitābihā al-yawma tujzawna mā kuntum ta'maloon

english_translation: And when the seas are filled with flame,
The Day the sky will be like murky oil,
When the sky has split [open]
But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -
And when the mountains are removed
The Inevitable Reality -
And when the trumpet is blown,

ayah_text: لَا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِن جُوعٍ
english_translation: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.
transliteration: La yusminu wa la yughnee min joo'

english_translation: And when the Hellfire is set ablaze
On the Day a man will flee from his brother
When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness],
And when the wild beasts are gathered,
So when vision is dazzled
But when there comes the Deafening Blast
And when the sky is stripped away,
And when the full-term she-camels are neglected
And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked
And when the stars fall, dispersing,
And when the pages are spread
And when the seas are erupted
And when the graves are overturned
And when the souls are paired
Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?
And when the mountains are blown away
And when the stars fall, dispersing,
Recite in the name of your Lord who created.
tajweed_notes: Ghunna on the noon with shaddah in بِاسْمِ

english_translation: And say, 'My Lord, increase me in knowledge.'

ayah_text: يَرْفَعِ اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنكُمْ وَالَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْعِلْمَ دَرَجَاتٍ
english_translation: Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees.
transliteration: Yarfa'i Allahu allatheena amanoo minkum wallatheena ootoo al'ilma darajat

ayah_text: إِنَّمَا يَخْشَى اللَّهَ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ الْعُلَمَاءُ
english_translation: Only those fear Allah, from among His servants, who have knowledge.
tajweed_notes: Idgham with ghunnah in مِنْ عِبَادِهِ

english_translation: And He taught Adam the names - all of them.

ayah_text: وَمَا أُوتِيتُم مِّنَ الْعِلْمِ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
english_translation: And you have not been given of knowledge except a little.
transliteration: Wama ooteetum mina al'ilmi illa qaleela
tajweed_notes: Idgham with ghunnah in مِّنَ الْعِلْمِ

ayah_text: قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِي الَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَالَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
english_translation: Say, 'Are those who know equal to those who do not know?'
transliteration: Qul hal yastawi allatheena ya'lamoona wallatheena la ya'lamoon

english_translation: And fear Allah. And Allah teaches you.

ayah_text: وَلَا تَقْفُ مَا لَيْسَ لَكَ بِهِ عِلْمٌ
english_translation: And do not pursue that of which you have no knowledge.
transliteration: Wala taqfu ma laysa laka bihi 'ilm

ayah_text: وَقَالَ الَّذِي عِندَهُ عِلْمٌ مِّنَ الْكِتَابِ
english_translation: And the one who had knowledge from the Scripture said...

ayah_text: وَإِن تَطِعْ أَكْثَرَ مَن فِي الْأَرْضِ يُضِلُّوكَ عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ
english_translation: And if you obey most of those upon the earth, they will mislead you from the way of Allah.
transliteration: Wa in tuti' akthara man fee al-ardi yudillooka 'an sabeel Allah

english_translation: And not equal are the blind and the seeing.

ayah_text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا قِيلَ لَكُمْ تَفَسَّحُوا فِي الْمَجَالِسِ فَافْسَحُوا يَفْسَحِ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ
english_translation: O you who have believed, when you are told, 'Space yourselves' in assemblies, then make space; Allah will make space for you.
transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo itha qeela lakum tafassahoo fee almajalisi fafsahoo yafsah Allahu lakum

ayah_text: وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ إِلَّا رِجَالًا نُّوحِي إِلَيْهِمْ
english_translation: And We sent not before you except men to whom We revealed [Our message].
transliteration: Wama arsalna min qablika illa rijalan noohee ilayhim

ayah_text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ اتَّبِعُوا مَا أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ قَالُوا بَلْ نَتَّبِعُ مَا أَلْفَيْنَا عَلَيْهِ آبَاءَنَا
english_translation: And when it is said to them, 'Follow what Allah has revealed,' they say, 'Rather, we will follow that which we found our fathers doing.'
transliteration: Wa itha qeela lahumu ittabi'oo ma anzala Allahu qaloo bal nattabi'u ma alfayna 'alayhi abaana
tajweed_notes: Idgham with ghunnah in بَلْ نَتَّبِعُ

ayah_text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَسْأَلُوا عَنْ أَشْيَاءَ إِن تُبْدَ لَكُمْ تَسُؤْكُمْ
english_translation: O you who have believed, do not ask about things which, if they are shown to you, will distress you.
transliteration: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tas'aloo 'an ashyaa in tubda lakum tasu'kum

ayah_text: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَن يُجَادِلُ فِي اللَّهِ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ
english_translation: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge.
transliteration: Wamina annasi man yujadilu fee Allahi bighayri 'ilm

english_translation: Woe to every sinful liar.
tajweed_notes: Idgham with ghunnah in لِّكُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ

ayah_text: وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ
english_translation: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you declare.
transliteration: Wallahu ya'lamu ma tusirroona wama tu'linon
tajweed_notes: Idgham with ghunnah in وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ

ayah_text: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ آمَنَّا بِاللَّهِ وَبِالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَمَا هُم بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
english_translation: And of the people are some who say, 'We believe in Allah and the Last Day,' but they are not believers.
transliteration: Wamina annasi man yaqoolu amanna billahi wabilyawmi al-akhiri wama hum bimu'mineen

ayah_text: قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِي الْأَعْمَىٰ وَالْبَصِيرُ أَمْ هَلْ تَسْتَوِي الظُّلُمَاتُ وَالنُّورُ
english_translation: Say, 'Are the blind and the seeing equal, or are the darknesses and the light equal?'
transliteration: Qul hal yastawi al-a'ma wa al-baseer am hal tastawi al-thulumat wa al-noor

english_translation: And above every possessor of knowledge is one [more] knowing.

ayah_text: قُل لَّا يَعْلَمُ مَن فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ الْغَيْبَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ
english_translation: Say, 'None in the heavens and earth knows the unseen except Allah.'
transliteration: Qul la ya'lamu man fee al-samawati wal-ardi al-ghayba illa Allah
tajweed_notes: Idgham with ghunnah in لَّا يَعْلَمُ

ayah_text: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمُ الَّذِي خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍ وَاحِدَةٍ
english_translation: O mankind, fear your Lord, who created you from one soul.
transliteration: Ya ayyuha al-nasu ittaqoo rabbakumu allathee khalaqakum min nafsin wahida
tajweed_notes: Idgham with ghunnah in مِّن نَّفْسٍ

ayah_text: وَاللَّهُ أَخْرَجَكُم مِّن بُطُونِ أُمَّهَاتِكُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ شَيْئًا
english_translation: And Allah has extracted you from the wombs of your mothers not knowing a thing.
transliteration: Wallahu akhrajakum min butooni ummahatikum la ta'lamoona shay'an

ayah_text: وَتِلْكَ الْأَمْثَالُ نَضْرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِ وَمَا يَعْقِلُهَا إِلَّا الْعَالِمُونَ
english_translation: And these examples We present to the people, but none will understand them except those of knowledge.
transliteration: Watilka al-amthalu nadribuha lilnnasi wama ya'qiluha illa al'aleemoon

ayah_text: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَيْءٍ إِنِّي فَاعِلٌ ذَٰلِكَ غَدًا
english_translation: And never say of anything, 'Indeed, I will do that tomorrow,'
transliteration: Wala taqoolanna lishay'in innee fa'ilun thalika ghadan
tajweed_notes: Idgham with ghunnah in لِشَيْءٍ إِنِّي

ayah_text: قُلِ اللَّهُمَّ فَاطِرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ
english_translation: Say, 'O Allah, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed,'
transliteration: Qul Allahumma fatira al-samawati wal-ardi 'alima al-ghaybi wa al-shahada

ayah_text: وَعَلَّمَكَ مَا لَمْ تَكُن تَعْلَمُ وَكَانَ فَضْلُ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكَ عَظِيمًا
english_translation: And He taught you that which you did not know. And ever has the favor of Allah upon you been great.
transliteration: Wa 'allamaka ma lam takun ta'lamu wakana fadlu Allahi 'alayka 'azeema

ayah_text: وَإِذَا جَاءهُمْ أَمْرٌ مِّنَ الْأَمْنِ أَوِ الْخَوْفِ أَذَاعُوا بِهِ
english_translation: And when there comes to them information about [public] security or fear, they spread it around.
transliteration: Wa itha jaa'ahum amrun mina al-amni awi al-khawfi atha'oo bihi

ayah_text: قُل لَّا يَسْتَوِي الْخَبِيثُ وَالطَّيِّبُ وَلَوْ أَعْجَبَكَ كَثْرَةُ الْخَبِيثِ
english_translation: Say, 'Not equal are the evil and the good, although the abundance of evil might impress you.'
transliteration: Qul la yastawi al-khabeethu wa al-tayyib walaw a'jabaka kathratu al-khabeeth

ayah_text: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بَالِغُ أَمْرِهِ ۚ قَدْ جَعَلَ اللَّهُ لِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدْرًا
english_translation: And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him. Indeed, Allah will accomplish His purpose. Allah has already set for everything a [decreed] extent.
transliteration: Wa man yatawakkal 'ala Allahi fahuwa hasbuhu. Inna Allaha balighu amrih. Qad ja'ala Allahu likulli shay'in qadra.

ayah_text: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا هُوَ مَوْلَانَا ۚ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ
english_translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us; He is our protector.' And upon Allah let the believers rely.
transliteration: Qul lan yuseebana illa ma kataba Allahu lana huwa mawlana wa 'ala Allah falyatawakkalil mu'minoon.

ayah_text: وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَتَوَكَّلُوا إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
english_translation: And upon Allah rely, if you should be believers.
transliteration: Wa 'ala Allah fatawakkaloo in kuntum mu'mineen.

ayah_text: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ الَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِرَ اللَّهُ وَجِلَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَإِذَا تُلِيَتْ عَلَيْهِمْ آيَاتُهُ زَادَتْهُمْ إِيمَانًا وَعَلَى رَبِّهِمْ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ
english_translation: The believers are only those who, when Allah is mentioned, their hearts become fearful, and when His verses are recited to them, it increases them in faith; and upon their Lord they rely.
transliteration: Innamal mu'minoon alladheena idha dhukira Allahu wajilat quloobuhum wa idha tuliat 'alayhim ayatuhu zadat'hum eemanan wa 'ala rabbihim yatawakkaloon.

english_translation: Sufficient for us is Allah, and [He is] the best Disposer of affairs.

ayah_text: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى الْحَيِّ الَّذِي لَا يَمُوتُ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِهِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِ خَبِيرًا
english_translation: And rely upon the Ever-Living who does not die, and exalt [Allah] with His praise. And sufficient is He to be, with the sins of His servants, Acquainted.
transliteration: Wa tawakkal 'ala al-hayyi alladhi la yamootu wa sabbih bihamdih. Wa kafa bihi bidhunoobi 'ibadihi khabeera.

ayah_text: وَلِلَّهِ غَيْبُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ يُرْجَعُ الْأَمْرُ كُلُّهُ فَاعْبُدْهُ وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَيْهِ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
english_translation: And to Allah belong the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth and to Him will be returned the matter, all of it, so worship Him and rely upon Him. And your Lord is not unaware of that which you do.
transliteration: Wa lillahi ghaybu as-samawati wal-ard. Wa ilayhi yurja'u al-amru kulluhu fa'bud'hu wa tawakkal 'alayh. Wa ma rabbuka bighafilin 'amma ta'maloon.

english_translation: And upon Allah let those who would rely [indeed] rely.

ayah_text: إِن رَّبَّكُمُ اللَّهُ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ اسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى الْعَرْشِ يُدَبِّرُ الْأَمْرَ ۖ مَا مِن شَفِيعٍ إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ إِذْنِهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ فَاعْبُدُوهُ ۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
english_translation: Indeed, your Lord is Allah, who created the heavens and the earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne, arranging the matter [of His creation]. There is no intercessor except after His permission. That is Allah, your Lord, so worship Him. Then will you not remember?
transliteration: Inna rabbakumu Allahu alladhi khalaqa as-samawati wal-ard fee sittati ayyamin thumma istawa 'ala al-'arsh. Yudabbiru al-amr. Ma min shafee'in illa min ba'di idhnih. Dhalikumu Allahu rabbukum fa'buduhu. Afala tadhakkaroon?

english_translation: They said, 'Sufficient for us is Allah, and [He is] the best Disposer of affairs.'

ayah_text: وَمَا لَنَا أَلَّا نَتَوَكَّلَ عَلَى اللَّهِ وَقَدْ هَدَانَا سُبُلَنَا ۚ وَلَنَصْبِرَنَّ عَلَىٰ مَا آذَيْتُمُونَا ۚ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ الْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
english_translation: And why should we not rely upon Allah while He has guided us to our [good] ways? And we will surely be patient against whatever harm you should cause us. And upon Allah let those who would rely [indeed] rely.
transliteration: Wa ma lana alla natawakkal 'ala Allah wa qad hadana subulana. Wa lanasbiranna 'ala ma athaytumoona. Wa 'ala Allahi falyatawakkalil mutawakkiloon.

english_translation: Allah will bring about, after hardship, ease.

ayah_text: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُدَافِعُ عَنِ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ خَوَّانٍ كَفُورٍ
english_translation: Indeed, Allah defends those who have believed. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone treacherous and ungrateful.
transliteration: Inna Allaha yudafi'u 'an alladheena amanoo. Inna Allaha la yuhibbu kulla khawwanin kafoor.

ayah_text: قُلْ أَيُّ شَيْءٍ أَكْبَرُ شَهَادَةً ۖ قُلِ اللَّهُ ۖ شَهِيدٌ بَيْنِي وَبَيْنَكُمْ ۚ وَأُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ هَٰذَا الْقُرْآنُ لِأُنذِرَكُم بِهِ وَمَن بَلَغَ ۚ أَئِنَّكُمْ لَتَشْهَدُونَ أَنَّ مَعَ اللَّهِ آلِهَةً أُخْرَىٰ ۚ قُل لَّا أَشْهَدُ ۚ قُلْ إِنَّمَا هُوَ إِلَٰهٌ وَاحِدٌ وَإِنَّنِي بَرِيءٌ مِّمَّا تُشْرِكُونَ
english_translation: Say, 'What thing is greatest in testimony?' Say, 'Allah is witness between me and you. And this Qur'an was revealed to me that I may warn you thereby and whoever it reaches. Do you [truly] testify that with Allah there are other deities?' Say, 'I will not testify [with you].' Say, 'Indeed, He is but one God, and indeed, I am free of what you associate [with Him].'
transliteration: Qul ayy shay'in akbaru shahadatan? Qulillahu shaheedun bayni wa baynakum. Wa oohiya ilayya hadha al-Quranu li'undhirakum bihi wa man balagh. A'innakum latashhadoona anna ma'a Allahi aliha ukhra? Qul la ashhadu. Qul innama huwa ilahun wahidun wa innani baree'un mimma tushrikoon.

ayah_text: وَإِن يُمْسِسْكَ اللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ وَإِن يُرِدْكَ بِخَيْرٍ فَلَا رَادَّ لِفَضْلِهِ ۚ يُصِيبُ بِهِ مَن يَشَاءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ ۚ وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الرَّحِيمُ
english_translation: And if Allah should touch you with adversity, there is no remover of it except Him; and if He intends for you good, then there is no repeller of His bounty. He causes it to reach whom He wills of His servants. And He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
transliteration: Wa in yamsaska Allahu bidurrin fala kashifa lahu illa huwa. Wa in yuridka bikhayrin fala radda lifadlih. Yuseebu bihi man yashaa'u min 'ibadih. Wa huwa al-Ghafoor ar-Raheem.

ayah_text: فَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ إِنَّكَ عَلَى الْحَقِّ الْمُبِينِ
english_translation: So rely upon Allah; indeed, you are upon the clear truth.

ayah_text: إِنَّ وَلِيِّيَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي نَزَّلَ الْكِتَابَ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى الصَّالِحِينَ
english_translation: Indeed, my protector is Allah, who has sent down the Book; and He is an ally to the righteous.
transliteration: Inna waliyyi Allahu alladhi nazzala al-kitab wa huwa yatawalla as-saliheen.

ayah_text: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ حَسْبُكَ اللَّهُ وَمَنِ اتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
english_translation: O Prophet, sufficient for you is Allah and for whoever follows you of the believers.
transliteration: Ya ayyuha an-nabiyyu hasbuka Allahu wa mani ittaba'aka mina al-mu'mineen.

ayah_text: وَمَا النَّصْرُ إِلَّا مِنْ عِندِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
english_translation: And victory is not except from Allah. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.
transliteration: Wa ma an-nasru illa min 'indi Allah. Inna Allaha 'azeezun hakeem.

ayah_text: قَالَ إِنِّي تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ رَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمْ ۚ مَا مِن دَابَّةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ آخِذٌ بِنَاصِيَتِهَا ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي عَلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
english_translation: Indeed, I have relied upon Allah, my Lord and your Lord. There is no creature but that He holds its forelock. Indeed, my Lord is on a path [that is] straight.
transliteration: Qala innee tawakkaltu 'ala Allahi rabbee wa rabbikum. Ma min dabbatin illa huwa akhidhun binasiyatiha. Inna rabbee 'ala siratin mustaqeem.

ayah_text: وَلَا تَهِنُوا وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا وَأَنتُمُ الْأَعْلَوْنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
english_translation: So do not weaken and do not grieve, and you will be superior if you are [true] believers.
transliteration: Wa la tahinu wa la tahzanu wa antumul a'lawna in kuntum mu'mineen.

ayah_text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا لَقِيتُمْ فِئَةً فَاثْبُتُوا وَاذْكُرُوا اللَّهَ كَثِيرًا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
english_translation: O you who have believed, when you encounter a company [from the enemy forces], stand firm and remember Allah much that you may be successful.
transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladheena amanoo idha laqeetum fi'atan fathbutu wadhkuru Allaha katheeran la'allakum tuflihoon.

english_translation: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me.
And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
Indeed, Allah loves those who rely [upon Him].

ayah_text: وَمَا تَوْفِيقِي إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ ۚ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَإِلَيْهِ أُنِيبُ
english_translation: And my success is not but through Allah. Upon Him I have relied, and to Him I return.
transliteration: Wa ma tawfeeqi illa billah. 'Alayhi tawakkaltu wa ilayhi uneeb.

ayah_text: فَإِذَا عَزَمْتَ فَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الْمُتَوَكِّلِينَ
english_translation: And when you have decided, then rely upon Allah. Indeed, Allah loves those who rely [upon Him].
transliteration: Fa idha 'azamta fatawakkal 'ala Allah. Inna Allaha yuhibbu al-mutawakkileen.

ayah_text: أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبْدَهُ ۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِالَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ اللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُ مِنْ هَادٍ
english_translation: Is not Allah sufficient for His Servant? And yet they threaten you with those other than Him. And whoever Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide.
transliteration: Alaysa Allahu bikafin 'abdah? Wa yukhawwifoonaka billadheena min doonih. Wa man yudlilil Allahu fama lahu min had.

ayah_text: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِاللَّهِ وَكِيلًا
english_translation: And rely upon Allah. And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
transliteration: Wa tawakkal 'ala Allah. Wa kafa billahi wakeela.
